quiz.title: My first quiz
quiz.welcometext:
This quiz is an example for a quiz with a time limit. You have 60 seconds to answer all six questions.

Instructions
You must answer every question. You can go back to all answered questions and change your selections. If you press the 'Finish' button after the last answer, you can't make changes.anymore If the time is elapsed, the quiz will end automatically.

Good luck.
quiz.question: Who was the first president of the USA?John AdamsAbraham LincolnGoerge WashingtonBarack Obama

To which group of islands belongs Vulcano?Canary IslandsPhilippinesAeolian IslandsNew Zealand
